text: @existentialfish Even Defying the vague recommendations from the White House!  I say let them protest share the 🦠, get Covid-19 that will keep them occupied for a while! I’m expecting @FoxNews to be on scene of these protest with live coverage-No masks! https://t.co/qpPaEEchYg
